docs.summary: Read and write orders from Wix Stores

permissions.name: Manage Orders
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores orders.

params.name: orderId
params.doc: Order ID (to which the fulfillment will be related)

docs.summary:
Creates a fulfillment (a subset of an order, with line items that are being shipped together) based on the body parameters passed with the request.
 If the site owner has requested it, calling this request will trigger an email to the customer (based on the Wix store settings)

permissions.name: Manage Orders
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores orders.

docs.summary:
Creates a new order.
 The following body params are required: totals.subtotal, totals.total, lineItems.quantity, lineItems.priceData, lineItems.name, channelInfo.type.
 Only orders with the paymentStatus parameter set as PAID or NOT_PAID will show up in the site owner's Stores Orders tab in their dashboard.
 The billingInfo.paymentProviderTransactionId and billingInfo.paymentMethod parameters can only be passed when paymentStatus is PAID.
 The billingAddress parameter is required unless channelInfo.type = POS.
 The shippingInfo.shipmentDetails.address parameter is required unless one of the following is true:
 1. the shippingInfo.pickupDetails is passed instead,
 2. channelInfo.type = POS,
 3. All order items are lineItems.lineItemType = digital.

 When passing lineItems.variantId, lineItems.options is required.
 When passing lineItems.productId, lineItem.lineItemType is limited to PHYSICAL.
 When not passing lineItems.productId, lineItem.lineItemType is limited to CUSTOM_AMOUNT_ITEM.

docs.summary:
Returns a list of up to 100 orders, given the provided paging, sorting and filters.  
See [Stores Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/wix-stores#pagination) for more information.
 Hidden orders are not returned

members.name: giftCard
members.doc: Total calculated gift card value, according to order.giftCard

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items, before tax

members.name: discount
members.doc: Total calculated discount value, according to order.discount

members.name: paymentProviderTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment provider (e.g., PayPal, Square, Stripe) transaction ID

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc: Payment method used for this order

members.name: refundableByPaymentProvider
members.doc: Whether order can be refunded by payment provider (manually or automatic)

members.name: paymentGatewayTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment gateway (e.g., Wix Payments)

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details (when this object describes pickup)

members.name: shipmentDetails
members.doc: Shipment details (when this object describes shipment)

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price

members.name: altText
members.doc: Alternative text for presentation when media cannot be displayed

members.name: id
members.doc: Media ID (for media items previously saved in Wix Media)

members.name: tax
members.doc: Tax applied for this line item

members.name: fulfillerId
members.doc: Line item fulfillerId from stores fulfillers. No value equals self fulfilled

members.name: translatedName
members.doc: Product name, translated into the customer's language

members.name: customTextFields
members.doc: Line item custom text field entry

members.name: productId
members.doc: Line item product ID (optional for POS orders)

members.name: mediaItem
members.doc: Primary media for preview of the line item

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount applied for this line item

members.name: index
members.doc: Line item ID (auto-generated, stable within this order only)

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price set for this line item

members.name: totalPrice
members.doc: Total price charged to the customer (per line item) after computation of quantity and discount

docs.summary: Buyer Info

members.name: index
members.doc: Line item ID (mirrors the line item index of the order).

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Line item quantity. 
 On creation, if this parameter isn't passed, the new fulfillment will automatically include all items of this line item that have not already been linked to a fulfillment.
 If the order does not have the requested quantity of line items available to add to this fulfillment, the fulfillment will not be created and an error will be returned.
 This property will always have a value when returned.

members.name: shippingProvider
members.doc:
Shipping provider. Using the following shipping providers will allow for autofilling the tracking link:
 * `fedex`
 * `ups`
 * `usps`
 * `dhl`
 * `canadaPost`

members.name: trackingLink
members.doc: Tracking link - autofilled if using a predefined shipping provider, otherwise provided on creation.

members.name: id
members.doc: Fulfillment ID (auto generated upon fulfillment creation).

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Information about the line items in the fulfilled order.

docs.summary: Custom field

members.name: value
members.doc: Free text that the customer entered in the custom field during the checkout process

members.name: translatedTitle
members.doc: The title translated according to the buyer language

members.name: paymentProviderTransactionId
members.doc: Payment provider transaction ID. Used to find refund transaction info on the payment provider's side.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for refund, given by user (optional).

members.name: externalRefund
members.doc: Whether refund was made externally (on the payment provider's side).

members.name: type
members.doc: Sales channel that submitted the order

members.name: externalOrderId
members.doc: Reference to an order ID from an external system, as defined in channelInfo (e.g., eBay or Amazon)

members.name: externalOrderUrl
members.doc: URL to the order in the external system, as defined in channelInfo (e.g., eBay or Amazon)

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: false`.

members.name: number
members.doc: Order number displayed in the owner's store (auto-generated).

members.name: lastUpdated
members.doc: Date and time of latest update.

members.name: archived
members.doc: Whether or not the order was archived.

members.name: activities
members.doc: Log of updates related to the order.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight unit used in this store.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store.

members.name: numericId
members.doc:
Orders unique numeric ID.
 Primarily used for sorting and filtering when crawling all orders.

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
Language to be used when communicating with the customer.
 For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the customer selected (otherwise this defaults to the site language).

members.name: channelInfo
members.doc: Information about the sales channel that submitted this order.

members.name: fulfillmentStatus
members.doc: Order's current fulfillment status (whether the order received a tracking number or was delivered/picked up).

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation).

members.name: fulfillmentId
members.doc: ID of the newly created fulfillment.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation).

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation).

members.name: read
members.doc: Whether the order was read by the store owner

members.name: number
members.doc: ID displayed in the owner's store (auto generated)

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation)

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight unit used in this store

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store

members.name: offset
members.doc: The offset since the beginning of the collection

members.name: items
members.doc: Requested number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: Requested offset since the beginning of the collection

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (to which the fulfillment will be related)

members.name: sendShippingConfirmationEmail
members.doc: when true shipping confirmation email will be sent to the buyer for all orders with shipment delivery

members.name: sendPickupReadyEmail
members.doc: when true pickup ready email will be sent to the buyer for all orders with pickup delivery

docs.summary:
Brazilian tax info types Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_TAX_TYPE - When the tax info type can't be classified, due to an error
  • CPF - CPF - for individual tax payers
  • CNPJ - CNPJ - for corporations

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_LINE_ITEM_TYPE - Line item type can't be classified, due to an error
  • PHYSICAL - Physical item type
  • DIGITAL - Digital item type
  • CUSTOM_AMOUNT_ITEM - Custom item price

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM - Media item type can't be classified, due to an error
  • IMAGE - Image item type

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_INVOICE_SOURCE - Invoice source can't be classified, due to an error
  • WIX - Invoice created using the Invoices API

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_ORDER_HISTORY_ITEM_TYPE - Activity item type can't be classified, due to an error
  • MERCHANT_COMMENT - Store owner added a comment
  • ORDER_PLACED - Order placed
  • ORDER_PAID - Order marked as paid, either by the store owner (for offline orders), or when an online transaction was confirmed
  • ORDER_FULFILLED - Order shipping status set as fulfilled
  • ORDER_NOT_FULFILLED - Order shipping status set as not fulfilled
  • DOWNLOAD_LINK_SENT - A download link was sent (relevant for orders with digital line items)
  • PICKUP_READY_EMAIL_SENT - An email notification for pickup was sent
  • TRACKING_NUMBER_ADDED - Shipping tracking number was set
  • TRACKING_NUMBER_EDITED - Shipping tracking number was edited
  • TRACKING_LINK_WAS_SET - Shipping tracking link was set
  • SHIPPING_CONFIRMATION_EMAIL_SENT - An email confirmation of order shipment was sent
  • INVOICE_WAS_SET - Invoice was set in the order
  • INVOICE_WAS_REMOVED - Invoice was removed from the order
  • INVOICE_WAS_SENT - Invoice was sent to customer via email
  • FULFILLER_EMAIL_SENT - Email was sent to fulfiller
  • SHIPPING_ADDRESS_EDITED - Shipping address was updated
  • EMAIL_EDITED - Order email was updated

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT - Weight unit can't be classified, due to an error
  • KG - Kilograms
  • LB - Pounds

This might be extended in the future with pending orders statuses Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_PAYMENT_STATUS - Payment status can't be classified, due to an error
  • NOT_PAID - Order is marked as not paid, and can be marked as paid later on. This is relevant for POS and offline orders
  • PAID - The order is marked as paid
  • PARTIALLY_REFUNDED - Order was refunded, refund amount less than order total price
  • FULLY_REFUNDED - Full order total price was refunded
  • PENDING - Order is pending response from the payment provider

Possible values are:
  • NOT_FULFILLED - None of the order items are fulfilled
  • FULFILLED - All of the order items are fulfilled Orders without shipping info are fulfilled automatically
  • CANCELED - Order is canceled
  • PARTIALLY_FULFILLED - Some, but not all of the order items are fulfilled

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_IDENTITY_TYPE
  • MEMBER - Site member
  • CONTACT - Contact

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED
  • WEB
  • POS
  • EBAY
  • AMAZON
  • OTHER_PLATFORM
  • WIX_APP_STORE

Possible values are:
  • USER
  • MEMBER
  • CONTACT
  • APP

Frequency unit of recurring payment Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • DAY
  • WEEK
  • MONTH
  • YEAR
